CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 展示；显示；演出；放映；指示；证明；表明；揭示；引导；带领；显露；透露；露出；表现；证明；给…看；播出（电视节目等）；上演（戏剧等）；展览；展出；（通过示范）教；解说
演出；表演；（电视或广播）节目；表现；展示；显示；外观；样子；迹象；征兆；（电视、电影等的）放映；展览；展示会；展览物；陈列品；（怀孕妇女临产前的）见红

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 展出；炫耀，卖弄（show的过去分词）
表演技巧；吸引观众的窍门

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指朦胧出现，好像从雾中浮现出来一样。
指明显地表露感情。也指用实例、实验推理等手段表演证明，或论证某一问题。
书面正式用词，指明确地表明。
多指将某物陈列在显眼之处以便让发现其优点，侧重有意识地显示。
最普通用词，泛指任何有意或无意地把东西给别人看的行为。
指公开或正式地展示，以便引人注目或让人检查。
多指大型博览会或国际博览会。
指展销会，商店橱窗或柜台上的陈列品。
指艺术品、农产品、工业品或商品等的任何形式的公开展览。
一般指较正规的展览会。
侧重指为促销商品而举办的展览会或商品交易会。
多指个人或团体陈列的展览品，规模可大可小。

word_group.brief_definition: 时装表演；时装秀；时装展
才艺展示；才艺秀；才艺表演
供展览的；装门面, 中看不中用的
带路, 引路；示范, 起表率作用

bilingual.source: This could show black and white and colour programmes.
bilingual.target: 这可以显示黑白和彩色节目。

bilingual.source: Pictures often show scribes with the tools of their trade.
bilingual.target: 图片中经常显示抄写员使用他们的工具。

bilingual.source: It will also show you a map in the top of the umbrella!
bilingual.target: 它还会在伞顶显示地图！

bilingual.source: Bar charts are used to show how something changes over time.
bilingual.target: 条形图用于显示某事物随时间的变化。

bilingual.source: These changes show how they have adapted to living in the forest and moving through the trees.
bilingual.target: 这些变化显示了它们如何适应在森林中生活和穿越树木。

bilingual.source: I read the newspaper and am shocked by the photos, which show that a hurricane in Asia has destroyed a town.
bilingual.target: 我读了报纸，被照片震惊了，显示亚洲的飓风摧毁了一个城镇。

bilingual.source: Then reference drawings are made for each character to show their exact size so that all the artists draw the same way.
bilingual.target: 然后为每个角色制作参考图，以显示他们的确切尺寸，以便所有艺术家以相同的方式绘制。

bilingual.source: The results show that he is right.

list.abstract: show，即校园秀网，最纯净大学生交流互动网站，国内最具人气的校园学习娱乐平台。
《Show》是BEJ48 Team B首台原创剧场公演《B A FIGHTER》的Unit曲目，由左放、段艺璇作词，Melodesign作曲，由BEJ48 Team B成员段艺璇、青钰雯、田姝丽于2018年1月19日在北京BEJ48星梦剧院首次表演。

yingyinNormal.en: But there is more than just our deal for me to consider. I need to show strength.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我要考虑的不仅是我们的协议，我得显示出力量。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. It's a front-projected holographic display combined with laser-based finger tracking. Here, I'll show you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，这是正投影全息显示加上手指激光跟踪器，来，我给你演示。

yingyinNormal.en: It is the day of the fun run. Madame Gazelle has a chart to show how far Daddy Pig must run.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天就是募捐长跑的日子。羚羊夫人有张图表，上面显示了猪爸爸要跑多少公里。

yingyinNormal.en: But if you think there is a problem with your wife, what better way to show the fairness of your own administration than by endorsing me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但如果你认为你妻子有问题的话，有什么比支持我更能显示你这届政府更公正呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Recent surveys show that a majority of small business owners support a gradual increase to ten dollars and ten cents an hour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最近的调查显示，大多数的小企业主都支持将工资标准逐步提高到每小时$10.10。

yingyinNormal.en: Hit that button, scan for Pods. Just about every 10 steps. Yeah, that doesn't even show the new ones. So, we can't go anywhere in the streets.
yingyinNormal.zh: 按那个按钮，扫描陷阱，大概十步就有一个，而且还没显示新安装的，所以我们哪儿都去不了。

yingyinNormal.en: We were able to run all the algorithms concurrently. And the resulting computer simulations of US Airways Flight 1549 show that the aviation engineers were correct.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们用各种算法同时进行演算，全美航空1549次航班的计算机模拟结果显示，航空工程师是对的。

yingyinNormal.en: You show them your keyboards, and your monitors. You'll move more inventory that way, and you'll make a hell of a lot more cash. You got me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也给他们展示键盘、显示器，你让他们在部件清单里随意选择组合这会带给你的商店出乎意料的现金流。你得相信我

yingyinNormal.en: Our record show that 1812 calls ended at the moment of the explosion. 52 of those calls were tethered to the cell tower nearest the train, so one of those calls was made by our bomber.
yingyinNormal.zh: 数据显示爆炸时刻共有1812通电话完成通话，有52通电话经由离火车最近的信号塔转接，其中就有设弹人打的电话。

yingyinNormal.en: We show good will when you show good will.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你表现出诚意，我们才会还以诚意。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, show her the trunk! Show her the trunk!
yingyinNormal.zh: 给她演示后备箱！给她演示后备箱！

yingyinNormal.en: I can show you. Sit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以帮你看看。请坐。

yingyinNormal.en: Why show his hand now?
yingyinNormal.zh: 它为何现在出手?
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

yingyinNormal.en: Isn't this a kids show?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不是儿童节目吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Uh, big fan of the show.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是您节目的粉丝。

yingyinNormal.en: Show me, then I'll decide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等看完了再做决定。

yingyinNormal.en: The girls will show you up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 姑娘们会带你们上去。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll show you the dark side.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会让你见识一下黑暗面的。

yingyinNormal.en: So you really like the show?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你真的喜欢这个秀？

yingyinNormal.en: It will be easier to show you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还是自己来看看吧。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 露面；出现；显示...；暴露；显露

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 表现；展示；表示；播放；放映；陈述

word_family.mean: v. 显示；使被看见；显露；证明；表明；展示；展现；出示；播出；引导；给…看

sense_info_list.en: demonstrate or prove

examination_example.sentence: Other research <highlight>shows</highlight> we're better at detecting deception from thin slices when we rely on intuition instead of reflection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他研究表明，当我们依靠直觉而不是思考时，我们更善于从细微的片段中发现欺骗。

examination_example.sentence: And regardless of transferability, the study <highlight>shows</highlight> that what's good for people may also be good for the environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 抛开可转移性不谈，这项研究表明，对人有益的东西可能也对环境有益。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>show</highlight> effects of different exposure times.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们证明了不同曝光时间的效果。

examination_example.sentence: Divorced persons may remarry, but a gender prejudice <highlight>shows</highlight> up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 离婚的人可以再婚，但是性别偏见出现了。

examination_example.sentence: Teachers, employers, and health professionals have been <highlight>shown</highlight> to harbor biases against the obese.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教师、雇主和卫生专业人员都表现出对肥胖者的偏见。

examination_example.sentence: His compositions demand the performer to <highlight>show</highlight> courage, for example in the use of dynamics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的作品要求表演者表现出勇气，例如在运用力度上。

examination_example.sentence: Watch people get on and <highlight>show</highlight> their tickets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看着人们上车并出示车票。

examination_example.sentence: For one trial, each participant was <highlight>shown</highlight> a pile of pens that the researcher claimed were from a previous experiment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一项试验中，每位参与者都被展示了一堆研究人员声称来自于之前试验的笔。

examination_example.sentence: The French measures rely too much on severe punishment to change a culture that regards beauty as skin-deep — and bone-<highlight>showing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国的措施过于依赖严厉的惩罚来改变一种注重外表美和骨感美的文化。

examination_example.sentence: Although good TV <highlight>shows</highlight> can help stir children's interest in conservation, they cannot replace the excitement of a zoo visit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然好的电视节目可以帮助激发孩子们对保护动物的兴趣，但它们无法取代参观动物园的兴奋。

examination_example.sentence: Many children – especially older ones – may base their real state knowledge on HGTV <highlight>shows</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多孩子——尤其是大一点的孩子——可能会把他们真正的国家知识建立在HGTV节目上。

examination_example.sentence: Priestly explains how the deep blue color of the assistant's sweater descended from fashion <highlight>shows</highlight> to department stores.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Priestly解释了助理毛衣的深蓝色是如何从时装秀延续到百货商店的。

examination_example.sentence: Three hours is how far in advance authorities are recommending people <highlight>show</highlight> up to catch a domestic flight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当局建议人们提前三小时搭乘国内航班。

sense_info_list.en: explain something to someone, by doing it or by giving instructions or examples
take someone somewhere by going there with them
an appearance of something that is not really sincere or real

word_usage.usage: show是可以接双宾语的动词，表示“给某人演示；教；解说”以及“对某人表现出；对待；表示”时，可以说show sth. to sb.也可以说show sb. sth.。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 活动; 事物; 机构

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 时装表演；时装秀；时装展

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 玻璃陈列柜；展示场所
n. 炫耀; 卖弄; 华丽
adj. 引人注目的；显眼的
n. 演出经理；演出主持人；擅长作戏剧性表演的人；擅长主持演出的人；擅长炫耀的人

word_family.mean: v. 显示；使被看见；显露；证明；表明；展示；展现；出示；播出；引导；给…看

sense_info_list.en: prove something or make the truth or existence of something known

examination_example.sentence: Research <highlight>shows</highlight> that a few moments of conversation with a stranger creates a measurable improvement in mood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究表明，与陌生人交谈片刻，情绪就会有明显的改善。

examination_example.sentence: Both absent-minded doodling and copying from life have been <highlight>shown</highlight> to positively affect your memory and visual perception.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生活中心不在焉的涂鸦和临摹都被证明对你的记忆和视觉有积极的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Evidence has <highlight>shown</highlight> they develop own-race bias from as young as three months of age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有证据表明，他们从3个月大的时候就开始产生自己的种族偏见。

sense_info_list.en: record or express a number or measurement

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>show</highlight> a difference between rich and poor nations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们显示了富国和穷国之间的差异。

examination_example.sentence: There is something almost delightful in the detachment from reality of advertisements <highlight>showing</highlight> mass-produced cars marketed as symbols of individuality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 超脱现实的广告展示了被宣传为象征个性的大批量生产的汽车，这几乎是一件令人愉快的事。

examination_example.sentence: Census data has <highlight>shown</highlight> Australians come from more than 200 countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人口普查数据显示，澳大利亚人口来自200多个国家。

examination_example.sentence: A survey <highlight>shows</highlight> shoppers today are getting more concerned about energy conservation and environmental protection when deciding what to buy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 调查显示，现在的消费者在消费时更多关注的是能源节约和环境保护。

examination_example.sentence: Surveys on consumers in the U.S. and the U. K. <highlight>show</highlight> that they also care about minimizing energy use and reducing waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对美国和英国消费者的调查显示，他们也关注能源消耗最小化，以及减少浪费。

examination_example.sentence: That's because it requires that they understand how all the parts of the <highlight>show</highlight> fit together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是因为它要求他们了解节目的各个部分是如何结合在一起的。

examination_example.sentence: Thank you for inviting me to join you on the <highlight>show</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谢谢你邀请我参加你的节目。

examination_example.sentence: He filed a deed preventing others from recreating him using CGI to appear in a film, TV <highlight>show</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他提交了一份契约，防止其他人使用CGI重现他在电影，电视节目中的形象。

sense_info_list.en: place in sight

examination_example.sentence: A collection of dramatic videos and photos quickly spread across social media, <highlight>showing</highlight> the horrifying destruction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一系列戏剧性的视频和照片迅速在社交媒体上传播，展示了可怕的破坏力。

sense_info_list.en: express ideas or feelings using actions or words

examination_example.sentence: Schneider has found that those who were enthusiastic about music and practiced voluntarily <highlight>showed</highlight> improvements in hearing ability and more general competencies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Schneider发现，那些对音乐充满热情并自愿练习的人在听力和更多的一般能力方面都有所提高。

examination_example.sentence: They do not <highlight>show</highlight> due respect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们没有表现出应有的尊重。

sense_info_list.en: take someone somewhere by going there with them

examination_example.sentence: Navigation apps will <highlight>show</highlight> a way around upcoming traffic jams.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 导航应用程序将为即将到来的交通堵塞指明道路。

sense_info_list.en: explain something to someone, by doing it or by giving instructions or examples
an activity, business, or organization, considered in relation to who is managing it
sense_info_list.zh: 活动; 事物; 机构

word_usage.usage:
show的过去式是showed，过去分词是shown或showed。
（1）被动结构中的过去分词只能用shown，不能用showed。
示例：我们被领进了一间卧室。
We were shown into a bedroom.
（2）主动结构中的过去分词两者均可使用，但showed用得较少。
示例：她已经一个月没露面了。
She has not shown up for a month.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 引人注目的；显眼的
n. 演出经理；演出主持人；擅长作戏剧性表演的人；擅长主持演出的人；擅长炫耀的人

word_family.mean: v. 显示；使被看见；显露；证明；表明；展示；展现；出示；播出；引导；给…看

sense_info_list.en: prove something or make the truth or existence of something known

examination_example.sentence: But at the very least, the research is starting to <highlight>show</highlight> that early setbacks don't have to be fatal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但至少，这项研究开始表明，早期的挫折并不一定是致命的。

examination_example.sentence: But as these findings <highlight>show</highlight>, exercise and academics may not be mutually exclusive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但正如这些发现所表明的，锻炼和学术可能并不相互排斥。

examination_example.sentence: What does the recent study of Norwegian mothers <highlight>show</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近对挪威母亲的研究表明了什么？

sense_info_list.en: record or express a number or measurement

examination_example.sentence: Experiment results <highlight>showed</highlight> that students who were not taught that people can change <highlight>showed</highlight> poor stress responses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实验结果表明，没有被告知人可以改变的学生，应激反应较差。

examination_example.sentence: The results <highlight>showed</highlight> almost no gains in math achievement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 结果显示数学成绩几乎没有提高。

examination_example.sentence: Research findings increasingly <highlight>show</highlight> the power of food to treat or reverse diseases, but that does not mean that diet alone is always the solution, or that every illness can benefit substantially from dietary changes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究结果越来越多地显示出食物治疗或逆转疾病的力量，但这并不意味着仅靠饮食就一定能解决问题，也不意味着每一种疾病都能从饮食改变中大大改善。

sense_info_list.en: express ideas or feelings using actions or words

examination_example.sentence: The number of people experiencing depression <highlight>shows</highlight> a sharp increase in the first year of high school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经历抑郁症的人数在高中一年级表现出一个急剧的增加。

examination_example.sentence: But surely, that's a positive sign <highlight>showing</highlight> that Mr. Bond has a lot of trust in you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但毫无疑问，这是一个积极的信号，表明邦德先生非常信任你。

examination_example.sentence: If nothing else, <highlight>showing</highlight> that you've tried to solve the problem yourself before you take it further.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果没有别的，那就表现出你在进一步解决问题之前已经尝试过自己解决问题了。

examination_example.sentence: Lunch boxes have been connecting kids to cartoons and TV <highlight>shows</highlight> and super-heroes for decades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几十年来，午餐饭盒一直将孩子们与卡通、电视节目和超级英雄联系在一起。

examination_example.sentence: For instance, you can move a TV to the kitchen and watch your favorite <highlight>shows</highlight> while you're standing at the sink.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，你可以把电视移到厨房，站在水槽边看你最喜欢的节目。

examination_example.sentence: Some viewers of her cooking <highlight>show</highlight>, The French Chef, insist they saw Child drop lamb on the floor and pick it up, with the advice that if they were alone in the kitchen, their guests would never know.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她的烹饪节目《法国大厨》(The French Chef)的一些观众坚称，他们看到 Child 把羊肉掉在了地上，并捡了起来。观众认为，如果只有他们单独在厨房里，他们的客人是不会知道的。

sense_info_list.en: place in sight

examination_example.sentence: And there it makes sense that failures <highlight>show</highlight> us the road to success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，失败指明成功之路的说法是有道理的。

examination_example.sentence: But you said you would <highlight>show</highlight> me what you could do for me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但你说过你会展示给我看你能为我做什么。

examination_example.sentence: If you wish to come into our office, we could <highlight>show</highlight> you the different solutions we offer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果您愿意来我们的办公室，我们可以向您展示我们提供的不同的解决办法。

examination_example.sentence: People like Tri Tran, who fled Vietnam on a boat in 1986, <highlight>showed</highlight> up in San Jose with nothing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像Tri Tran这样的人，1986年乘船逃离越南，出现在圣何塞时一无所有。

examination_example.sentence: The company already made square metal meal containers and some had started to <highlight>show</highlight> up in the hands of school kids.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司已经生产了方形金属餐盒，有些已经开始出现在学生手中。

examination_example.sentence: Some <highlight>show</highlight> up ready, but many do not at this critical time when young brains are developing rapidly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人已经准备好了，但许多人在年轻大脑快速发育的关键时刻还没有准备好。

sense_info_list.en: take someone somewhere by going there with them
be easy to see or notice

word_usage.usage:
show的过去式是showed，过去分词是shown或showed。
（1）被动结构中的过去分词只能用shown，不能用showed。
示例：我们被领进了一间卧室。
We were shown into a bedroom.
（2）主动结构中的过去分词两者均可使用，但showed用得较少。
示例：她已经一个月没露面了。
She has not shown up for a month.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 玻璃陈列柜；展示场所
adj. 引人注目的；显眼的
n. 演出经理；演出主持人；擅长作戏剧性表演的人；擅长主持演出的人；擅长炫耀的人

word_family.mean: v. 显示；使被看见；显露；证明；表明；展示；展现；出示；播出；引导；给…看

sense_info_list.en: place in sight

examination_example.sentence: During the training stage, each dog was <highlight>shown</highlight> only the upper half or the lower half of the person's face.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在训练阶段，每只狗只看到人的上半张脸或下半张脸。

examination_example.sentence: Susanna Reid is <highlight>showing</highlight> families how to prepare delicious and nutritious meals on a tight budget.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Susanna Reid向家庭展示如何在预算紧张的情况下烹制出美味又营养的饭菜。

examination_example.sentence: Fortunately, I didn't get any channels <highlight>showing</highlight> all-night movies or I would never have gotten to bed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 幸运的是，我没有任何播放通宵电影的频道，否则我永远也不会上床睡觉。

sense_info_list.en: prove something or make the truth or existence of something known

examination_example.sentence: The findings <highlight>show</highlight> a critical need to invest in disaster prevention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 调查结果显示，亟需投资于防灾。

examination_example.sentence: Their answers also <highlight>show</highlight> that they dislike talking to others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的回答也表明他们不喜欢与他人交谈。

examination_example.sentence: The exhibition had record attendance, <highlight>showing</highlight> that there is huge interest in Chinese influences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这次展览的参观人数创下了记录，表明人们对中国影响具有巨大的兴趣。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 展出; 展览; 播出
展示; 出示; 给…看
解释; 说明; 演示

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 才艺展示；才艺秀；才艺表演

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 玻璃陈列柜；展示场所
n. 表现；展示；表示；播放；放映；陈述

word_family.mean: v. 显示；使被看见；显露；证明；表明；展示；展现；出示；播出；引导；给…看

sense_info_list.en: prove something or make the truth or existence of something known

examination_example.sentence: During this month, a lot of activities will be held to <highlight>show</highlight> the importance of exercise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这个月里，会举办很多活动来证明锻炼的重要性。

examination_example.sentence: A smile on your face <highlight>shows</highlight> you are happy or friendly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你脸上的微笑表明你很高兴或友好。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>shows</highlight> who you are and where you're from.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它表明了你是谁，你来自哪里。

sense_info_list.en: to be or make sth available for the public to see
sense_info_list.zh: 展出; 展览; 播出

examination_example.sentence: The following will <highlight>show</highlight> you the astronauts' daily life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下面将向你展示宇航员的日常生活。

examination_example.sentence: They will <highlight>show</highlight> these works of art to remind people not to leave rubbish when climbing the mountain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们将展示这些艺术作品，提醒人们登山时不要留下垃圾。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>shows</highlight> some must-see works.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它展示了一些必看的作品。

sense_info_list.en: express ideas or feelings using actions or words

examination_example.sentence: Chinese like to sing this song to <highlight>show</highlight> their love of being Chinese.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国人喜欢唱这首歌来表达他们对中国人的热爱。

examination_example.sentence: I love my job and I know how challenging it is, so I hope kids can <highlight>show</highlight> their teachers more respect (尊敬).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我热爱我的工作，我知道它很有挑战性，所以我希望孩子们能对他们的老师表现出更多的尊敬。

examination_example.sentence: It can give people warm feelings, <highlight>show</highlight> your respect to others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它能给人温暖的感觉，表达你对他人的尊重。

examination_example.sentence: For a moment, he thought about giving up the <highlight>show</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有那么一瞬间，他想过放弃这个节目。

examination_example.sentence: Why not watch a talk <highlight>show</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么不看脱口秀节目呢？

examination_example.sentence: What <highlight>shows</highlight> is Dong Qing hosting now?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 董卿现在主持什么节目？

sense_info_list.en: to make it possible for something to be seen
sense_info_list.zh: 展示; 出示; 给…看

examination_example.sentence: Let the teenagers <highlight>show</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让青少年展示给你。

examination_example.sentence: However, Turner wanted to <highlight>show</highlight> the sun setting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，Turner想展示日落。

examination_example.sentence: Did Qingdao <highlight>show</highlight> anything special to the world during the SCO Summit (上海合作组织峰会)?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 青岛在上海合作组织峰会期间向世界展示了什么特别之处吗？

sense_info_list.en: record or express a number or measurement

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Shows</highlight> the number of the artists in the book.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 显示了书中艺术家的数量。

examination_example.sentence: Which picture <highlight>shows</highlight> the change of the electricity cost after the use of solar panels?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哪张图显示了太阳能电池板使用后电费的变化？

examination_example.sentence: Maps by hand <highlight>show</highlight> facts of the city more correctly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 手绘地图更准确地显示了城市的实际情况。

examination_example.sentence: I understand that the picture does not always <highlight>show</highlight> the real color.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我知道图片并不总是显示真实的颜色。

sense_info_list.en: take someone somewhere by going there with them

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>showed</highlight> them around Xi'an.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他带他们参观了西安。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>showed</highlight> me around and I saw many interesting things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他带我四处转转，然后​我看到了很多有趣的事情。

examination_example.sentence: She took the lift to the 1st floor（楼层），and a clerk <highlight>showed</highlight> her where her desk was.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她乘电梯到一楼，然后一名接待员带领她去她的办公桌。

sense_info_list.en: explain something to someone, by doing it or by giving instructions or examples
sense_info_list.zh: 解释; 说明; 演示

examination_example.sentence: We were <highlight>shown</highlight> how to use chopsticks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有人向我们演示了如何使用筷子。

examination_example.sentence: Then she <highlight>showed</highlight> me how to mix them with salt and oil.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后她向我演示了如何将它们与盐和油混合。

word_usage.usage:
show的过去式是showed，过去分词是shown或showed。
（1）被动结构中的过去分词只能用shown，不能用showed。
示例：我们被领进了一间卧室。
We were shown into a bedroom.
（2）主动结构中的过去分词两者均可使用，但showed用得较少。
示例：她已经一个月没露面了。
She has not shown up for a month.
